comment_body:
It's that damned Candy Crush application, making kids hallucinate sewer drain for a void.

Candy Crush aside, I like the story. The description of the hole is nice and imaginable, and the mysteriousness of the whole thing is very good. Scary, and a good story. Keep on writing!

I want to jump in the hole to see where it'll lead me. Base on the internet, I might end up in China, but that's okay.
